tree.name: Santi Aldama
tree.tradeDescription: Memphis traded Jared Butler, 2022 2nd round pick (Jabari Walker) and 2026 2nd round pick to Utah for Santi Aldama
tree.note: Loyola Maryland forward, acquired from Utah on draft night 2021

assetsGivenUp.name: Jared Butler
assetsGivenUp.note: Baylor guard, acquired from New Orleans in Jonas Valanciunas 3-team trade, immediately sent to Utah

assetsGivenUp.name: Jonas Valanciunas
assetsGivenUp.note: Lithuanian center, acquired from Toronto in Marc Gasol trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Marc Gasol
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: MEM traded Pau Gasol and 2010 2nd (Devin Ebanks) to LAL for Kwame Brown, Javaris Crittenton, Marc Gasol, Aaron McKie, 2008 1st (#28 Donté Greene) and 2010 1st (Greivis Vásquez)
assetsGivenUp.note: Spanish center, Marc was the key long-term piece MEM got back in the Pau Gasol blockbuster

assetsGivenUp.name: Pau Gasol
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Vancouver Grizzlies traded Shareef Abdur-Rahim and draft rights to Jamaal Tinsley (#27) to Atlanta Hawks for draft rights to Pau Gasol (#3), Brevin Knight and Lorenzen Wright
assetsGivenUp.note: 2001 #3 overall pick; drafted by ATL, rights traded to Vancouver Grizzlies. 6x All-Star, 2002 Rookie of the Year. Won 2 titles with LAL after trade.

assetsGivenUp.name: Shareef Abdur-Rahim
assetsGivenUp.note: 1996 #3 overall pick by Vancouver Grizzlies; franchise's first star player

assetsGivenUp.name: 2001 #27 Overall Pick (Jamaal Tinsley)
assetsGivenUp.note: Draft rights traded to ATL in Pau Gasol deal; Tinsley was sent to IND on draft night

assetsGivenUp.name: 2010 MEM 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Sent to LAL in Pau Gasol trade; became #43 overall
